intro: Carve your own path through swirling bullet barrages!Face stages that seamlessly shift between 2D and 3D, using melee attacks to gain the upper hand.
description:
- A Bullet Hell STG with a Literally “Diagonal” Evolution!
This is an original bullet-hell STG!
In this game, you can freely move around during stages!
Set in a Japanese-style townscape, girls clash in fierce battles with bullet barrages and close-range attacks.
By using melee attacks, you can erase enemy bullets, and with the points you earn, purchase items and upgrades—so even players who struggle with bullet hell can feel at ease (probably).
Go wild with powerful weapons earned through multiple playthroughs, or if you’re confident in your skills, experience the thrill of dodging everything with pure technique!

- Unique Weapons with Personality
Defeat bosses in rematches and earn original weapons as rewards.
Each boss provides weapons with different special effects and stats, such as attack power and charge speed, with randomized values.
The upper and lower limits of these random stats can be checked in the in-game 「りーどみー」 section.
